Package weka.attributeSelection

Class SymmetricalUncertAttributeEval

java.lang.Object
weka.attributeSelection.ASEvaluation
weka.attributeSelection.SymmetricalUncertAttributeEval
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, AttributeEvaluator, CapabilitiesHandler, CapabilitiesIgnorer, CommandlineRunnable, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler
public class SymmetricalUncertAttributeEval extends ASEvaluation implements AttributeEvaluator, OptionHandler
SymmetricalUncertAttributeEval :

Evaluates the worth of an attribute by measuring the symmetrical uncertainty with respect to the class.

SymmU(Class, Attribute) = 2 * (H(Class) - H(Class | Attribute)) / H(Class) + H(Attribute).

Valid options are: 

 -M
  treat missing values as a separate value.
Version:
$Revision: 15519 $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
